âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Accurate 3D geometry estimation (point maps, depth maps, normal maps) â€¢ Optional ground-truth FOV input for enhanced accuracy â€¢ Flexible resolution support â€¢ Optimized for speed (60ms latency on A100/RTX3090 with FP16)
ðŸ“– Summary: MoGe is a model designed for estimating 3D geometry from single images. It provides metric point maps, depth maps, normal maps, and camera FOV estimation. The model supports flexible resolutions, optional ground-truth FOV input, and is optimized for speed, making it suitable for various applications requiring monocular geometry estimation.
